description: As a User I cancel an order
name: User should be able to cancel an order

elements.name: User should be able to cancel an order

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'

steps.name: I go to the orders table and click on edit for the order
I am on the Amending Booking page I click cancel order button
I should see "The order will be cancelled" with color "rgb(217, 63, 28)"
I should see a Refund Button
I click on the Refund Button
I should be taken to the Refund page
I should see "Booking cancelled" header with color "rgb(117, 164, 14)" and "Your booking has been cancelled" header
